president.name: Andrew Colleran
president.description: The chief administrative officer of Student Government. Completes the appointment of all unelected Student Government positions and spearheads the advocacy for the students.

vicePresident.name: Sneha Kafle
vicePresident.description: The supporting member to the President and Speaker. Set to advertise, recruit, and monitor for any Student Government workgroups.

speaker.name: Dikshyant Thapa
speaker.description: Designated person for administrative correspondence with Student Government, and the Parliamentary for Student Government's Senate meetings.
